ministry.name: Youth Ministry
ministry.description: Our Youth Ministry is dedicated to helping young people grow in their faith, build meaningful relationships, and discover their purpose in Christ. We provide a safe, welcoming environment where teens can explore their faith, ask tough questions, and develop into strong Christian leaders.
ministry.mission: To equip and empower youth to know Christ, grow in faith, and serve others with passion and purpose.

leadership.name: Marcus Johnson
leadership.bio: Marcus has been serving in youth ministry for over 10 years. He is passionate about helping teens discover their identity in Christ and develop authentic faith.

leadership.name: Sarah Mitchell
leadership.bio: Sarah brings creativity and energy to our youth programs. She loves planning events and creating opportunities for students to connect with each other and God.

leadership.name: David Chen
leadership.bio: David leads our small group ministry, helping students build deep, authentic relationships through weekly Bible studies and mentorship.

leadership.name: Emily Rodriguez
leadership.bio: Emily leads our youth worship team, helping students encounter God through music and creative expression.

regular.name: Sunday Youth Service
regular.description: High-energy worship, relevant teaching, and community building for all youth.

regular.name: Wednesday Night Live
regular.description: Midweek gathering with games, worship, small groups, and Bible study.

regular.name: Small Groups
regular.description: Gender-specific small groups meeting in homes for deeper connection and discipleship.

special.name: Summer Camp
special.description: Week-long summer camp with worship, teaching, outdoor activities, and life-changing experiences.

special.name: Fall Retreat
special.description: Weekend retreat focused on spiritual growth, team building, and fun activities.

special.name: Mission Trip
special.description: International mission trip serving communities and sharing the love of Christ.

special.name: Winter Ski Trip
special.description: Weekend ski trip combining outdoor adventure with spiritual growth and community.

programs.name: Discipleship Groups
programs.description: Small, gender-specific groups focused on spiritual growth, accountability, and biblical discipleship.

programs.name: Worship Team
programs.description: Opportunities for musically gifted students to serve by leading worship for youth services.

programs.name: Mission & Service
programs.description: Local and international mission opportunities to serve communities and share the Gospel.

programs.name: Leadership Development
programs.description: Training program equipping students to become leaders in their schools, communities, and church.
